text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Abuse" has the meaning stated in § 5-701 of this title.
"Administration" means the Social Services Administration of the Department.
"Child" means any individual under the age of 18 years.
"Indicated" has the meaning stated in § 5-701 of this title.
"Kinship care" has the meaning stated in § 5-501 of this title.
"Local department" has the meaning stated in § 1-101 of this article.
"Neglect" has the meaning stated in § 5-701 of this title.
"Out-of-home placement" means placement of a child into foster care, kinship care, group care, or residential treatment care.
"Ruled out" has the meaning stated in § 5-701 of this title.
"Secretary" means the Secretary of Human Resources.
"Unsubstantiated" has the meaning stated in § 5-701 of this title.
